kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Although the administration UI technology has been built to support localization with both back-end and front-end resource strings, Xperience doesn't have any APIs or features to localize the administration UI as of October 2024. 
However, we've received feedback from customers and partners requesting the ability to at least manually localize the UI.
We are tracking this feedback and making plans for support sometime next year.
If you'd like to see this prioritized sooner [give us some feedback](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes)!
